comment: Time to install miles and miles of razor-wire fences at the border, as well as I-beam triangular barriers for vehicles. Have the military build the wall, rather than waiting for congress to pull their thumbs out of their asses. At this point, the choice is clear: America will have Barriers or it will defend itself with Bullets, or it will be Borderless.
amr:
# ::snt Time to install miles and miles of razor-wire fences at the border, as well as I-beam triangular barriers for vehicles. Have the military build the wall, rather than waiting for congress to pull their thumbs out of their asses. At this point, the choice is clear: America will have Barriers or it will defend itself with Bullets, or it will be Borderless.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / time
            :time-of (ii / install-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (f / fence
                              :mod (w / wire
                                    :mod (r / razor))
                              :quant (m2 / multiple
                                    :op1 (d / distance-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (m3 / mile))))
                        :op2 (b / barrier
                              :mod (t2 / triangular)
                              :ARG1-of (b2 / beam-01
                                    :ARG0 (ii2 / i))
                              :purpose (v / vehicle)
                              :quant (m4 / multiple
                                    :op1 (d2 / distance-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (m5 / mile))))
                        :ARG2 (b3 / border))))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (h / have-04
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (b4 / build-01
                        :ARG0 (m6 / military)
                        :ARG1 (w2 / wall)))
            :ARG2 (w3 / wait-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG1 y
                  :ARG2 (p / pull-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Congress"))
                        :ARG1 (t3 / thumb
                              :poss m6)
                        :ARG2 (o / out-06
                              :ARG1 t3
                              :ARG2 (a2 / ass)))))
      :snt3 (c2 / clear-06
            :ARG1 (c3 / choose-01
                  :ARG1 (o2 / or
                        :op1 (h2 / have-03
                              :ARG0 (c4 / country
                                    :name n
                                    :op1 "America"))
                        :ARG1 (b5 / barrier))
                  :op2 (d3 / defend-01
                        :ARG0 c4
                        :ARG1 c4
                        :instrument (b6 / bullet))
                  :op3 (h3 / have-03
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 c4
                        :ARG1 b3)))
      :time (p2 / point
            :mod (t4 / this)))
